title: Lupita Nyong'o shines in a white-sequin skirt and black turtleneck for the 2019 BAFTA LA Awards
text:
The 2019 British Academy Britannia Awards were held at The Beverly Hills Hilton Hotel in Los Angeles on Friday night.

And Lupita Nyong'o was among the slew of high-profile stars to stun under the bright lights of the red carpet.

Among those to be honored with awards at the festive event included Phoebe Waller-Bridge, Jordan Peele, Jackie Chan, Steve Coogan, Norman Lear and Jane Fonda.

Fonda accepted her award via video feed, just hours after she was arrested for the third time in recent weeks while attending a climate change protest in Washington, DC.

Glowing: Lupita Nyong'o was among the slew of high-profile stars to stun under the bright lights of the BAFTA LA Awards in Beverly Hills on Friday night

Making a statement: The Oscar-winning actress, 36, looked equal parts stylish and elegant in a full-length white-sequined skirt and a black turtleneck

Nyong'o, 36, looked equal parts stylish and elegant in a full-length white-sequined skirt that literally glistened under the bright lights of the sea of photographers.

The actress, who won an Best Supporting Actress Oscar for 12 Years A Slave, was able to show off her amazing toned figure in a fitted black turtleneck

She rounded out her ensemble with black strapped heels and her raven tresses pulled back off her face.

British actress Phoebe Waller-Bridge was honored with the Britannia Award for British Artist of the Year.

Honoree: Jane Fonda appeared via video feed to accept her award during the 2019 British Academy Britannia Awards

No show: Earlier in the day honoree Fonda was arrested for the third time in two weeks during a climate change protest in Washington, DC

The Killing Eve star, 34, commanded attention in an all-black outfit that included a one-should top that had a bow over her left shoulder area.

Fellow Brit Steve Coogan, 54, went with a traditional black tuxedo and black bow-tie, but opted for more casual-wear in white sneakers.

The actor-comedian was on hand to receive the Charlie Chaplin Britannia Award for Excellence in Comedy.

Honorees: British actors Phoebe Waller-Bridge and Steve Coogan were among the stars who were honered with BAFTA awards during the event

Honoree: Acclaimed writer-director Jordan Peele, 40, arrived on the red carpet with his wife Chelsea Peretti on his arm

Highly acclaimed writer and director Jordan Peele, 40, arrived with wife Chelsea Peretti on his arm, dressed in a fitted all-black tuxedo.

The Oscar-winner, who was honored with John Schlesinger Britannia Award for Excellence in Directing, wore a black shirt and black dress shoes to round out his svelte look.

His wife, who's best known for portraying Gina Linetti in the police comedy series Brooklyn Nine-Nine, wore a leggy black-and-white patterned dress.

The shoulder-less design and slit along the left side helped her flaunt her womanly curves at a moments notice.

Honoree: Legendary television producer Norman Lear looked handsome in a classic black suit

Honoree: Jackie Chan. 65, looked stylish in a black lapel-less suit

Legendary producer Norman Lear, 97, was honored with the Britannia’s Excellence in Television award.

The Connecticut native, who's best known for his work on All In The Family, Sanford And Son, The Jeffersons, and Good Times, among others, looked handsome in a classic black two-piece suit and a white hat.

Jackie Chan, 65, looked stylish in a black lapel-less suit when he received the Albert R. Broccoli Britannia Award for Worldwide Contribution to Entertainment;

English charm: British natives Lady Victoria Hervey and Piers Morgan both opted to go with black ensembles

Handsome: British actors Taron Egerton, 29 and Jamie Bell, 33, looked handsome as they shared the spotlight in their black ensembles

Fonda, 81, wore a white top and a beret-style hat when she appeared accepted the Stanley Kubrick Britannia Award for Excellence in Film honoree was Jane Fonda.

She choose to skip the event to attend the recent climate change protests in the US Capitol, which has resulted in her being cuffed and arrest three times.

Some of the other celebrities on hand for the awards show included Kerry Washington, Piers Morgan, Lady Victoria Hervey, Taron Egerton, Jamie Bell, Victoria Summer and Donald Glover.

The British Academy of Film and Television Arts Los Angeles honors individuals who have dedicated their careers to advancing the art forms of the moving image in the US, UK and beyond, according to the organization website www.bafta.org.

Fashionista: Kerry Washington lit up the red carpet with her multi-colored sequined mini-dress

Ladies time: Washinton and Nyong'o shared some personal moments together

Oscar winners: Lupita Nyong'o and Jordan Peele snuggled up for a chat during the event

Colleagues: Nyong'o starred in Peele's highly-acclaimed 2019 horror film Us

Unique: American writer-actor Donald Glover, 36, went with a more edgy style in pleated red flared pants and a matching tuxedo-style shirt and bow-tie
description: Lupita Nyong'o shined on the red carpet in a white-sequin skirt and black turtleneck for the 2019 BAFTA LA Awards in Beverly Hills on Friday night.
